title: Skarner PBE Nerfs
body: Do you think I should keep playing Skarner, even with the proposed PBE nerfs, or move on to someone else with the same style? (Hard lockdown with damage.) Also who should I try out if I should change jungle mains? I was thinking Vi. Any other opinions?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=giddo244,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=g3AWQo57,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-11-27T05:15:50.620+0000)
>
> Do you think I should keep playing Skarner, even with the proposed PBE nerfs, or move on to someone else with the same style? (Hard lockdown with damage.) Also who should I try out if I should change jungle mains? I was thinking Vi. Any other opinions?

Have you read this? 

"From what I understand, the team just wanted to try out a few different avenues as to how we want to nerf Skarner. Though it won't show up on the PBE over the holiday weekend, I believe the plan is to go with a pared down version of these nerfs for final changes. 
It seems worth noting here that it can be difficult to really try more than one thing out at a time in an effort to land on the correct change when it comes to nerfs and buffs, because we tend to get large reactions from players when we do so. I'm not saying that reaction isn't justified (since we don't have the greatest history of being fully transparent on every change you see on the PBE), but I do think that's what is going on in this case."

source (http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/11/red-post-collection-illaoi-introduction.html)

Looks like the nerfs won't be as bad as they are at the moment. But he is getting nerfed yeah. So up to you if you want to keep playing him.
Already have J4, so I'll probably try Vi and Lee. Thanks

Rammus is supposed to be one of the best junglers in the game at the moment but idk.

Jarvan and Vi are really good simple champions with a good mix of CC, Tank, mobility and clear speed.

I honestly have no idea why Skarner is being that nerfed that hard. He's not really OP ATM just kinda strong. Yet they are giving Brand (the guy on 56% winrate) the smallest nerf out. Riot WTF?

I think the nerfs are quite bad actually, so yeah I'd probably switch mains for a bit. Most tanks are pretty bad ATM. Here's my list of people you might want to try out:

1. {{champion:59}}  Jarvan
2. {{champion:254}} Vi
3. {{champion:64}}  Lee Sin
4. {{champion:54}}  Malphite (Not so great in higher elo)
5. {{champion:33}} Rammus (Haven't actually played this guy since season 4 tank meta, but his winrate is respectable.)

Those are all the good lockdown junglers, {{champion:32}} Amumu is a debatable option right now too. The mana struggles are so real though.
its adc meta... rammus is the anti adc tank...
He has poor clear time though, in a bruiser jungle meta. But yeah you're right, I was just saying that because I haven't tried him out myself.
